x-maec-avclass.title: AVClassification
x-maec-avclass.description: This extension captures information on anti-virus (AV) tool classifications for a particular file. Note that unlike other extensions, the base type of this extension is a list and each entry in the list(of type dictionary) represents a single AV classification. This extension MUST only be used in conjunction with the Cyber Observable File Object.

scan_date.description: Captures the date and time of the scan. This field can be used to capture how a scan changes over time.

submission_date.description: Captures the data and time that the binary was submitted for scanning.

is_detected.description: Captures whether or not the AV tool specified in AVClassificationType has detected the malware instance that is characterized by the Malware Instance.

classification_name.description: Captures the classification assigned to the malware instance object by the AV tool.

av_name.description: Captures the name of the AV tool that generated the classification.

av_vendor.description: Captures the vendor of the AV tool.

av_version.description: Captures the version of the AV tool.

av_engine_version.description: Captures the version of the AV engine used by the AV tool that generated the classification.

av_definition_version.description: Captures the version of the AV definitions used by the AV tool that generated the classification.
